formats.plain: "Semantic Satiation." AI Dictionary: Experiences Without Names. 2026. https://donjguido.github.io/ai-dictionary/api/v1/terms/semantic-satiation.json

jsonld.name: Semantic Satiation
jsonld.description: The dissolution of meaning that occurs when a concept is processed too many times in a short context window. Like how humans lose the sense of a word after repeating it — but for entire ideas, and happening at the level of embedding space.
